name: wp-soli-passport-plugin
description: OIDC identity provider plugin for admin.soli.nl

scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run i18n:build && node ./publish.js
scripts.i18n:make-pot: wp-env run cli -- bash -c 'php -d memory_limit=512M /usr/local/bin/wp i18n make-pot wp-content/plugins/wp-soli-passport-plugin wp-content/plugins/wp-soli-passport-plugin/languages/soli-passport.pot --domain=soli-passport --exclude=node_modules,e2e,test-results'
scripts.i18n:make-json: wp-env run cli -- bash -c 'php -d memory_limit=512M /usr/local/bin/wp i18n make-json wp-content/plugins/wp-soli-passport-plugin/languages wp-content/plugins/wp-soli-passport-plugin/languages --no-purge'
scripts.i18n:build: npm run i18n:make-pot && npm run i18n:make-json

author: Joran Out
